lead_paragraph: Mistakes on an absentee ballot and an elections notice led to costly corrections and to concerns from voter advocacy groups.

headline.print_headline: A $200,000 Ballot Error and Other Misprints at New York City’s Board of Elections
headline.main: A $200,000 Ballot Error and Other Misprints at New York City’s Board of Elections

snippet: Mistakes on an absentee ballot and an elections notice led to costly corrections and to concerns from voter advocacy groups.
abstract: Michael J Ryan, New York City Board of Elections executive director, says corrected ballots have been mailed out to thousands of absentee voters for upcoming presidential primary; typos led to board spending over $200,000 to fix and mail out corrected absentee ballots on time.
